message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but $200 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now.  Would you be willing to come down to $150?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand your concerns about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $175.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $175 is still a little higher than I'm comfortable with.  Would you consider $160?  I'm really hoping we can reach an agreement.
I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $170.
